summary: Represents the eighth routine antenatal care visit (ANC8) for pregnant women, delivering scheduled interventions, applying ageâ€‘specific care, and arranging subsequent appointments or inpatient admission if complications arise.
business_intent: Enable the health system to manage and execute the eighth antenatal contact, ensuring appropriate maternal interventions are provided at around 36 weeks gestation, updating the care schedule, and handling escalation to inpatient care when needed.
